subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Garland threw fewer pitches in nine innings than the Mets’ starter, Mike Pelfrey, did in five as the Diamondbacks cruised past the home team at Citi Field after a long rain delay.
snippet: Jon Garland threw fewer pitches in nine innings than the Mets’ starter, Mike Pelfrey, did in five as the Diamondbacks cruised past the home team at Citi Field after a long rain delay.
